PhysicalConfig
[System.Serializable]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Configuration.​PhysicalConfig

This class is a container for all of the settings related to the physical setup of the hardware, both the tracking camera and the display.

In order to modify the settings of the service, create an instance of this class, make the changes you wish to see, and then send it to the server using the ConfigurationManager.

Like all of the Settings classes found in this file, all members are optional. If you do not modify a member of this class, its value will not change when the instance is sent to TouchFree Service.

Properties
screenHeightM
public float screenHeightM { get; set }

The height of the screen in meters. This is needed in order to determine the relationship between hand location in the real world and pixel locations on screen.

leapPositionRelativeToScreenBottomM
public Vector3 leapPositionRelativeToScreenBottomM { get; set }

The position (measured in meters) in 3d space of the Leap Motion camera relative to the center of the bottom edge of the screen.

This uses a left handed coordinate system where: X = left/right (right = positive) Y = up/down (up = positive) Z = forward/backward (forward = positive)

leapRotationD
public Vector3 leapRotationD { get; set }

The rotation of the Leap Motion Camera relative to the unity world space, measured in degrees

screenRotationD
public float screenRotationD { get; set }

The rotation of the physical screen relative to the unity world space, measured in degrees

Variables
configValues
public Dictionary<string, object> configValues

This dictionary is used to store the edited members only, and is accessed when serializing the data for transfer to the Service.

DO NOT MODIFY THIS DICTIONARY MANUALLY

ScreenHeightM
[SerializeField]
private float ScreenHeightM
LeapPositionRelativeToScreenBottomM
[SerializeField]
private Vector3 LeapPositionRelativeToScreenBottomM
LeapRotationD
[SerializeField]
private Vector3 LeapRotationD
ScreenRotationD
[SerializeField]
private float ScreenRotationD
